sqlMap.select: SELECT qna.lectureqnano, qna.id, qna.subject, qna.readcnt, qna.regdate FROM sol_lectureqna qna join sol_category category ON qna.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok = #gwamok# ORDER BY qna.lectureqnano DESC limit #qno#, #qnaNumPerPage#
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM sol_lectureqna qna join sol_category category ON qna.categoryno = category.categoryno WHERE category.grade = #grade# AND category.gwamok = #gwamok#
SELECT categoryno from sol_category WHERE grade = #grade# AND gwamok = #gwamok#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sol_lectureqna(categoryno, id, subject, content, regdate) VALUES (#categoryno#, #id#, #subject#, #content#, now())
sqlMap.select: select lectureqnano, id, subject, content, readcnt, regdate from sol_lectureqna where lectureqnano = #lectureqnano#
sqlMap.update: update sol_lectureqna set readcnt = readcnt + 1 where lectureqnano = #lectureqnano#
